tool_description: Converts metadata from various formats to Dublin Core standard with mapping rules and element refinement options.

source_metadata.description: JSON string of source metadata to convert

source_format.description: Source metadata format: mods, marc, ead, custom

use_qualified_dc.description: Use qualified Dublin Core with element refinements

mapping_profile.description: Mapping profile: standard, library, museum, archive

error_messages: Invalid source metadata: The source_metadata is not valid JSON
Unsupported source format: Use mods, marc, ead, or custom
Invalid mapping profile: Use standard, library, museum, or archive

usage: Provide source_metadata as JSON and specify source_format. Choose mapping_profile based on your institution type and enable use_qualified_dc for refined elements.

dublin_core_record.description: JSON string of converted Dublin Core metadata

mapped_fields.description: Array of successfully mapped field names

unmapped_fields.description: Array of source fields that could not be mapped

conversion_quality.description: Quality score of conversion from 0 to 1
